quests.name: A Defender's Training
objectives:
(Fishing for Precision) Fish to exercise your precision and patience.
  ‧ Catch 10 Salmon in Mulan's Realm
  ‧ Return to Mulan.
  ‧ Put the Fish in the cauldron.

(Brick Breaking) Break bricks to develop your strength.
  ‧ Break 8 Training Bricks.

(Orienteering) Go orienteering to challenge your endurance.
  ‧ Talk to Mulan to start the Orienteering challenge.
  ‧ Follow Mulan.
  ‧ Open the door to the Training Maze.
  ‧ Equip the Training Weights.
  ‧ Talk to Mulan.
  ‧ Search the Maze for the 8 Pebbles.
  ‧ Bring the Pebbles to Mulan.

quests.name: Training Treasures
objectives: Bring what you've found to Mulan.

quests.name: Protecting the Camp
objectives:
Gather and fish out:
  ‧ The 10 Broken Logs.

Remove:
  ‧ The 8 Sand Piles.
  ‧ The 7 Rocks.

Return to Mulan.
  ‧ Water the 10 Tree Seeds.
  ‧ Plant 10 Mulan's Tree Seeds in the patches of soil.

Gather Materials:
  ‧ 40 Brown Sand.
  ‧ 15 Fiber.
  ‧ Craft 20 Sandbags.
Make sure you have the Sandbags in your Inventory.
Make sure everything is okay with Mushu.
Return to the Valley and place Mulan and Mushu's House.
